body.name: Mirrotek - Full Length Adjustable Over The Door Mirror Gold Aluminum Finish - Hanging Instant Install Long Full Body Mirror for Bedroom, Dorm Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 15 hrs 22 mins
features: BEAUTIFUL FULL LENGTH MIRROR - You'll absolutely adore the beautiful modern slim and sleek design of our stunning rectangular Gold Aluminum frame finish frame. Choose the perfect match for your home, bedroom, closet, dorm or apartment. Dimensions: 48" L x 13.7" W
EASY INSTANT HANGING - No tools required! No damaging your door. In just 5 seconds, click the mirror into place over your bedroom, dorm, or closet door.

ADJUSTABLE FULL MIRROR - Each big mirror is perfect for adults or children to properly view themselves while getting ready. Simply unhook the adjustable patented hanging hooks and choose one of the 3 hanging levels. Takes only 5 seconds and zero tools required to adjust your mirror. Wall mount includes anti scratch wall screw.

SAFE SHATTERPROOF GLASS - Each Mirrotek mirror is manufactured and shipped in sturdy extra protective packaging. Our mirrors are designed for durability and long life. Each premium mirror features shatterproof and childproof glass.

MIRROTEK MADE - You will receive a full refund if your mirror arrives cracked or damaged. This mirror is proudly made and manufactured by Mirrotek, the mirror, armoire and storage experts since 1942. Purchase with confidence that your mirror is made by experienced craftsmen with a strict adherence to industry leading quality control.
body.description: Enjoy our modern sleek over the door hanging mirror with three adjustment levels for people of all ages and heights. The beautiful low profile frame is available in multiple aluminum metal or rich wood finishes and can be hung over the front or back of any bedroom door, closet door, bathroom door, dorm doors, office doors and more. Our unique shatterproof glass ensures safety while hanging, using and transporting your new Mirrotek hanging mirror.FEATURES & BENEFITS:Multiple Beautiful Frame OptionsDoor or Wall MountThree Easy Height AdjustmentsShatterproof GlassChild SafeDurable, Built to LastNo Assembly RequiredInstalls in SecondsNo Tools RequiredIncludes Optional Security Tape GiftSpecially Patented Hanging Hooks48 Inches Tall by 13.7 Inches WideGREAT FOR KIDSOur specially designed shatterproof glass is designed to be child friendly. Because kids grow so fast, we have easy adjustment settings to help lower or raise the mirror on whatever door you hang it on. That means, no matter your height, you can set the mirror to your desired level to help you get dressed, prep and start your day with confidence and style.SAFE AND EASY SETUPThe shatterproof glass ensures the mirror will be family safe even on the highest traffic doors that open and close all day long. Plus, our secure shipping guarantees your glass arrives perfectly intact or we’ll replace it.YOU CAN TRUST MIRRORTEKSince 1942, Mirrotek have been the mirror, armoire and storage experts. Our skilled craftsmen design and craft our products with the highest quality materials and a strict adherence to quality control. We build products that are built to last in your home, living space or place of business.

productInformation.value: #63,894 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #66 in Floor & Full Length Mirrors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good with alterations
reviews.reviewText: Used for a bathroom mirror as I like to see myself full length before I go anywhere. This mirror was not the sturdiest since it doesn’t come with anything to hold down the bottom portion if you are hanging on the back of a door like I did. I anchored the bottom of the mirror onto my door with two plastic mirror clips and it did the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adhesive not holding
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mirror a few months ago, and every other day I have to piece it back together. It is coming apart and hanging crooked. Idk what to do with it at this point. I don’t want it to completely come apart and shatter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality - good for standard 6’8” doors
reviews.reviewText: Mirror is heavy duty and installs super easy. My original intention was to hang this on the 8’ door (second picture attached). However, even on the lowest install bracket, it did not come down far enough. Instead, I hung this on a standard 6’8” door (first picture attached). And it works just fine.I did add some felt furniture protectors so the hanging bracket doesn’t scratch the paint off the door.The mirror is heavy enough it doesn’t swing too much when opening the door, but I added some sticky tac to the bottom back of the mirror anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mirror for my son’s room. The mirror itself is fairly heavy and sturdy. However, the frame it comes encased in is not.I hung the mirror over my son’s bedroom door. A few weeks later something unimaginable happened. I heard a loud crashing sound coming from my son's room.The frame at the top of the mirror had snapped (broken) into two parts. The mirror fell out of the frame and crashed into the nightstand beside my son's bed.Fortunately, my son was not in his room at the time. He could have been seriously injured or killed if the mirror had fallen on him.The 30-day period to request a refund had already closed when this happened. However, given the circumstances, I didn't think it should matter.For some reason Amazon said it was not possible to contact the seller at that time, and Amazon Customer Service initially told me there was nothing they could do. However, after I made Amazon aware of how dangerous this episode had been, they gave me the refund I requested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Functional but poorly manufactured
reviews.reviewText: Came absolutely covered in bits of fiberglass. Hangs crooked. Wobbles and makes lots of noise whenever the door is moved. Frame isnt quite square. Etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love my mirror I have it hung up over my door and it has never fell and it came perfect and it’s also easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mirror for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: Works great both standing on its own or hanging on the back of the door. It is also packed well so it arrived without breaking (unlike other mirrors I attempted to purchase in the past)
